short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With AnimeNoFiller, you'll never have to wonder again whether an episode is canon or filler.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AnimeNoFiller v1.1 🚀
Enhance your anime-watching experience!

📺 Supported Websites:
- animevision.masterstreet.cl (Español, ad-free)
- 3.animeflv.net (Español)
- Crunchyroll
- 9anime

🌟 Features:
- Easily distinguish between canon and filler episodes
- Visual indicators for each episode type
- Covers 135 popular anime series

🔝 Most Popular Anime Covered:
Dragon Ball, Naruto, One Piece, Attack on Titan (Shingeki no Kyojin), 
Death Note, Fullmetal Alchemist, Neon Genesis Evangelion, Yu-Gi-Oh!, 
Cowboy Bebop, Sailor Moon, and many more!

🌍 Supported Languages:
English, Español, Português, Français

🆕 Latest Updates:
- Expanded language support
- Added more anime series

ℹ️ About AnimeNoFiller:
AnimeNoFiller is a Chrome extension that enhances your Crunchyroll and 3.AnimeFLV 
experience by providing episode classification information for your favorite anime series.

⚠️ Disclaimer:
This is a third-party extension developed independently. While we strive for accuracy, 
classifications may vary. Use as a helpful guide rather than a definitive source.

🧡 Feedback:
We're currently in Alpha and value your input! Please share your suggestions 
or report any issues by leaving a review. Help us improve your anime-watching experience!
